entry.title: Lint Options
entry.content:
Lint Options

当我们需要定制Lint的相关属性时，可以在module的build.gradle中作相关的配置，如下：

参数配置

具体的属性以及描述详见下表：

属性说明
PropertyDescription
abortOnErrorWhether lint should set the exit code of the process if errors are found
当发现错误时，是否终止当前处理流程
absolutePathsWhether lint should display full paths in the error output. By default the paths are relative to the path lint was invoked from.
lint在输出错误信息的时候是否显示完整路径。默认显示相对路径
checkThe exact set of issues to check, or null to run the issues that are enabled by default plus any issues enabled via LintOptions.getEnable() and without issues disabled via LintOptions.getDisable(). If non-null, callers are allowed to modify this collection.
具体的issue检查集合，为null时会检查默认开启的issue以及设置为 enable 的issue但是不包含已设为 disable 的issue。如果不是null，则允许调用者修改这个集合
checkAllWarningsReturns whether lint should check all warnings, including those off by default
是否检测所有的警告，包含那些默认关闭的警告
checkReleaseBuildsReturns whether lint should check for fatal errors during release builds. Default is true. If issues with severity “fatal” are found, the release build is aborted.
在 release 编译的时候，lint是否检查严重错误。默认是true。如果发现fatal级别的issue，会终止编译
disableThe set of issue id’s to suppress. Callers are allowed to modify this collection.
设置禁止检测的issue，允许调用者修改这个集合
enableThe set of issue id’s to enable. Callers are allowed to modify this collection. To enable a given issue, add the issue ID to the returned set.
设置开启的issue。添加issue ID到这里的集合中，可以使对应的issue生效
explainIssuesReturns whether lint should include explanations for issue errors. (Note that HTML and XML reports intentionally do this unconditionally, ignoring this setting.)
lint是否需要包含issue错误的解释（注意HTML和XML的报告中会包含相关的解释，该设置无效）
htmlOutputThe optional path to where an HTML report should be written
HTML报告的保存路径
htmlReportWhether we should write an HTML report. Default true. The location can be controlled by LintOptions.getHtmlOutput().
是否输出HTML报告。默认是true。报告的位置取决于LintOptions.getHtmlOutput()
ignoreWarningsReturns whether lint will only check for errors (ignoring warnings)
检测过程是否只关心错误（忽略警告）
lintConfigThe default configuration file to use as a fallback
指定配置文件，默认的配置文件作为备用
noLinesWhether lint should include the source lines in the output where errors occurred (true by default)
在输出结果中错误发生的地方是否包含源文件的行号信息（默认为true）
quietReturns whether lint should be quiet (for example, not write informational messages such as paths to report files written)
是否静默（例如：不在输出文件里写类似路径的信息）
severityOverridesAn optional map of severity overrides. The map maps from issue id’s to the corresponding severity to use, which must be “fatal”, “error”, “warning”, or “ignore”.
一个可选的map用来覆写严重级别。这个map映射了issue id和严重级别，级别必须是 “fatal”, “error”, “warning”, 或者 “ignore”
showAllReturns whether lint should include all output (e.g. include all alternate locations, not truncating long messages, etc.)
是否包含所有的输出（比如包含所有的可选信息，不截断长消息等等）
textOutputThe optional path to where a text report should be written. The special value “stdout” can be used to point to standard output.
纯文本输出路径。指定为“stdout”时，可以设定为控制台输出
textReportWhether we should write an text report. Default false. The location can be controlled by LintOptions.getTextOutput().
是否需要纯文本输出，路径由LintOptions.getTextOutput()决定
warningsAsErrorsReturns whether lint should treat all warnings as errors
是否把所有的警告都当成错误来处理
xmlOutputThe optional path to where an XML report should be written
XML报告的输出路径
xmlReportWhether we should write an XML report. Default true. The location can be controlled by LintOptions.getXmlOutput().
是否需要输出XML报告，路径由LintOptions.getXmlOutput()决定
